Join Us

Home Career

Volunteering Opportunities

Join us in making a difference in the lives of vulnerable children and communities in Uganda. Mtoto W’Afrika Child Care Ministries offers volunteering opportunities in Adjumani and Luweero districts. Volunteers play a vital role in our programs, including education, community development, and child care. Your time and skills can help transform lives and bring hope to those in need.

Whether you are passionate about teaching, healthcare, farming, or community outreach, there is a place for you in our team. We welcome individuals from all walks of life who are willing to share their talents and make a positive impact.

Download the volunteer application form below, fill it out, and send it back to us to get started on this rewarding journey.

Download Volunteer Form

Alternatively, you can fill out our online application form by clicking the link below: Fill Online Form

About Us

Mtoto W’afrika Child Care Ministries was founded in 2013. We are hinged on the willingness and hope to spread the unconditional love of Jesus Christ to the next generation of leaders in the hard-to-reach communities in Uganda and across borders.
